inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male or female with diagnosis of metastatic breast carcinoma and documented history of hypothyroidism.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: TSH level within normal range at baseline
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Ability and willingness to provide informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Life expectancy estimated to be less than 3 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Is currently pregnant or intends to become pregnant during the duration of the study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis, but TSH level is within normal range at baseline. She has a history of hypothyroidism and metastatic breast carcinoma.
